channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's DOJ purge backfires as courts toss Comey, James cases

item.title: Republicans consider quitting Congress early over death threats and infighting
item.description: Death threats and infighting are spurring House Republicans to contemplate whether they want to stay in Congress — or even leave early. Why it matters...

item.title: The balance of AI power tilts toward Google
item.description: The world's most popular chatbot, ChatGPT, faces new threats from its biggest competitor: Google's Gemini. Why it matters: Google was caught on the ba...

item.title: Russia strikes Kyiv after U.S., Ukraine report progress on Trump peace plan
item.description: Russia launched a series of strikes on Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, early Tuesday and killed at least two people, the city's mayor said. The big picture: ...

item.title: Sen. Jim Justice, wife to pay $5 million in back taxes to settle IRS suit
item.description: The senator from West Virginia and his wife struck the agreement hours after the Justice Department filed a lawsuit. The IRS said the unpaid taxes dat...

item.title: After a week of censures, some in Congress are having second thoughts
item.description: Censures were historically rare rebukes against lawmakers. But members of the House are increasingly using them in ways their peers say are political.

item.title: As judges face more threats, only the Supreme Court got new security funds
item.description: Judiciary officials had asked lawmakers for an additional $142 million for security for lower federal courts, a 19 percent increase.

item.title: Trump designates chapters of Muslim Brotherhood ‘foreign terrorist organizations’
item.description: The White House said the designation will help combat the group’s transnational network, which it said fuels terrorism and destabilization campaigns a...

item.title: Judge tosses cases against Comey and James, rules prosecutor appointment unlawful
item.description: The decision disqualifying Lindsey Halligan as interim U.S. attorney sets back President Donald Trump’s efforts to use the Justice Department to targe...

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
